Class AbstractPlatformService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snamp.AbstractAggregator
      • com.snamp.AbstractPlatformService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aggregator, PlatformService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAdapter, AbstractManagementConnectorFactory, Agent, AgentManagerBase, RestAdapterService

    public abstract class AbstractPlatformService
extends AbstractAggregator
implements PlatformService
    Represents an abstract class for building SNAMP platform services.

    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
